Luthien

Platform: React, Magento 2
Type: Personal Project
View Project: Project Site

About The Project

While learning React, I was working with Magento 2 regularly, and since Magento 2 had APIs available, I wanted to see if I can create a simple PWA Shopping app using React. This is more of a proof-of-concept project and a showcase of my skills at an early stage of learning React.

Development

This website consists of Homepage, Category page, and cart/checkout page. On category page, user can add product to the cart, search through the catalog and switch between the list/grid view. Checkout has been simplified with hard-coded data so there is no need to fill out the forms.

Of course, my recent work with PWA studio is more feature-complete and overall better, but I consider this to be impressive proof-of-concept at the time.
